translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: -[man 1] Turn him over. -[man 2] Is he alive?
translation.zh: -把他翻过来-还活着吗？

translation.en: [woman] Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 能听见我说话吗？

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.zh: 你在哪里？我都打了一个小时电话了

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
translation.zh: 劳娜 你现在已经不是我妻子了

translation.en: Thanks for that, Mick,
translation.zh: 米克 多谢提醒

translation.en: I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.zh: 我还是很混乱有时候觉得自己是你妻子

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
translation.zh: 其余的时候 我更像是你妈

translation.en: Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.zh: 别耍花招你以为我听不出来你把手机拿远了？

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.zh: 这家律师行由我来管理

translation.en: what's left of it anyway,
translation.zh: 反正是律师所的残余

translation.en: and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
translation.zh: 所以我必须能联系上你

translation.en: Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
translation.zh: 好吧 你联系上我了 有什么事情？

translation.en: [Lorna] We got a call from Judge Holder.
translation.zh: 霍尔德法官给我们打了个电话

translation.en: -She wants to meet with you ASAP. -The Chief Judge?
translation.zh: -她想尽快见你一面-首席法官？

translation.en: Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.zh: 严格地说是审判长别告诉我你跟她有一腿

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
translation.zh: 没有 你怎么会说出这种话？

translation.en: The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.zh: 你被传唤到女法官私人办公室的唯一原因

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.zh: 要么是你有一件案子在她手上要么就是你们之间有私事

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.zh: 既然你一年都没接任何案子了…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
translation.zh: 我从没见过这个女人

translation.en: -She wants to meet with you now. -But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.zh: -她现在想见你-可她没说是什么事吗？

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
translation.zh: 没说 但我们能不能对这件事

translation.en: this might be positive?
translation.zh: 态度积极一些？

translation.en: Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.zh: 也许她想指派一件公益案件给你

translation.en: -Work begets work. -Well, maybe.
translation.zh: -这能带来更多的工作机会-也许吧

translation.en: Mick?
translation.zh: 米克？

translation.en: Still here.
translation.zh: 人在呢

translation.en: Drive one of the Lincolns.
translation.zh: 从林肯车里面挑一辆开

translation.en: They're in storage.
translation.zh: 都封存着呢

translation.en: Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.zh: 那就解封一辆那林肯车就是你的门面

translation.en: And you become you.
translation.zh: 然后你就重回正轨

translation.en: Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.zh: 这要是个真正的机会你米奇哈勒要全力以赴

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.zh: 今晚你接海莉 我就是提醒你一下

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
translation.zh: 因为你觉得我会忘了？

translation.en: Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.zh: 6点整 明白吗？不是6点10 不是6点05

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
translation.zh: 谁这么幸运今晚约到了你？是我认识的人吗？

translation.en: 6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
translation.zh: 6点整 米奇

translation.en: [Mickey] I got it.
translation.zh: 好吧 我记住了

translation.en: Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.zh: 有没有什么玛丽霍尔德法官的料能跟我说说吗？

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么问这个？

translation.en: I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.zh: 我也不知道她传唤我去她的办公室

translation.en: -Did you do something? -No, I haven't done something.
translation.zh: -你搞了什么案子？-没有 我没接过案子

translation.en: Then why would she call you to chambers?
translation.zh: 那她为什么传唤你去办公室？

translation.en: I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.zh: 我不知道才问你的你能告诉我你对她的了解吗？

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
translation.zh: 她喜欢抓住点事情就大做文章

translation.en: which makes me think you've done something.
translation.zh: 因为这个我还以为你跟她有点问题

translation.en: -Thanks. -Wait, Mickey--
translation.zh: -谢了-等等 米奇…

translation.en: I'll see you tonight.
translation.zh: 我们今晚见

translation.en: He's done something.
translation.zh: 他是有点事情

translation.en: [Lorna] Oh, hello, Mick.
translation.zh: 你好 米克

translation.en: -Lorna. -I was driving this way anyway.
translation.zh: -劳娜-我顺路过来看看

translation.en: -No. You're checking up. -[Lorna] Says who?
translation.zh: -才不是 你这是查岗-谁说的？

translation.en: You look good. I have always loved this one.
translation.zh: 你看上去不错 我一直喜欢这套西服

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这儿干什么？

translation.en: This could be a very big deal.
translation.zh: 可能会是件大事

translation.en: She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.zh: 她是审判长 所以我过来打探消息

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 还有呢？

translation.en: Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.zh: 她大部分的工作是行政性的哪个法官接受哪个案子什么的

translation.en: [Mickey] And?
translation.zh: 还有呢？

translation.en: And… she assigns cases.
translation.zh: 还有…她负责案件分配

translation.en: -If that's what this is about… -You don't want me to blow it.
translation.zh: -如果是因为这事…-你希望我别搞砸了

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.zh: 我就是随便说说无论是什么 必须搞定 好吗？

translation.en: [Holder] Mr. Haller, I presume.
translation.zh: 我猜你是哈勒先生

translation.en: Judge Holder.
translation.zh: 霍尔德法官

translation.en: I don't believe we've met before.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该没有见过面

translation.en: No, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 没有 法官大人

translation.en: Well, come on then.
translation.zh: 好 过来吧

translation.en: The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
translation.zh: 大家都管你叫“林肯车律师”？

translation.en: Some do, yes.
translation.zh: 有些人是这么叫我

translation.en: Or did.
translation.zh: 或者说以前这么叫我

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.zh: 我以前大部分时间都花在路上一个庭接一个庭的出

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
translation.zh: 一直在开车

translation.en: Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
translation.zh: 如果出了事可以随时逃脱追捕

translation.en: Never fled the jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 我从来没被司法系统的人追过

translation.en: Have a seat.
translation.zh: 请坐吧

translation.en: What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.zh: 你跟杰瑞文森特关系怎么样？

translation.en: Jerry Vincent?
translation.zh: 杰瑞文森特？

translation.en: Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.zh: 他还是检察官的时候我跟他交锋过几次

translation.en: And he switched sides.
translation.zh: 然后他就改做律师了

translation.en: He was murdered last night.
translation.zh: 他昨晚被人杀了

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 您说什么？

translation.en: Shot dead in his car.
translation.zh: 在车里中枪而死

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: If you were close, please accept my condolences,
translation.zh: 如果你们关系很好 请接受我的哀悼

translation.en: but that's not why you're here.
translation.zh: 但你来这里不是为了听我哀悼他

translation.en: Were you close?
translation.zh: 你们关系好吗？

translation.en: I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
translation.zh: 大体上可以说是同事之间的友情吧

translation.en: He left you his practice.
translation.zh: 他把他的律师所留给你了

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
translation.zh: 您说什么？

translation.en: Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.zh: 十天前 文森特先生向法院提交了一份动议

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.zh: 准许他在无法履职或身故的情况下

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.zh: 把他的整个律师事务所留给你

translation.en: -He never discussed this with you? -No.
translation.zh: -他从没跟你谈过这个？-没有

translation.en: Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.zh: 他昨晚去世所以他的案件现在就都是你的了

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
translation.zh: 包括特雷弗埃利奥特诉讼案

translation.en: You have heard of that?
translation.zh: 你听说过这个案子吗？

translation.en: The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.zh: 杀了老婆和情夫的技术男

translation.en: Allegedly.
translation.zh: 被指控

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: That's now my case?
translation.zh: 现在是我的案子了？

translation.en: They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: 全是你的了 哈勒先生

translation.en: You might not get to keep them.
translation.zh: 你也许留不住这些案子

translation.en: Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.zh: 委托人获悉文森特先生的死讯后

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.zh: 都有权委托另外的代理律师

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
translation.zh: 这只意味着你是优先代理人

translation.en: Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
translation.zh: 这种情况的前提是

translation.en: are being transferred to a replacement counsel
translation.zh: 我认为文森特先生的委托人被转移给

translation.en: of good standing and competent skill.
translation.zh: 一位信誉良好且称职的替代律师

translation.en: As far as I can tell,
translation.zh: 据我了解

translation.en: you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.zh: 你已经很久都没代理过案件

translation.en: Yeah. [clears throat] I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.zh: 对 我发生了事故 差不多是一年半之前

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
translation.zh: 说出来不知您信不信我是在冲浪时出的事儿

translation.en: I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.zh: 动了好几次手术 还有并发症

translation.en: Complications?
translation.zh: 并发症？

translation.en: I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.zh: 我止痛药上瘾了但好在我得到了救治 一切都过去了

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.zh: 我已经脱瘾了所以无论您对我的名声有什么顾虑…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.zh: 我顾虑的是我自己的名声我一批准这些案子就是你的了

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 或者我也可以不批准

translation.en: Why you?
translation.zh: 为什么是你呢？

translation.en: Of all the lawyers out there.
translation.zh: 他认识这么多律师

translation.en: Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.zh: 实话实说 法官大人我自己都不知道

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
translation.zh: 那如果你猜猜呢？

translation.en: Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.zh: 我跟您说过 杰瑞和我关系不错

translation.en: we trusted each other.
translation.zh: 我们互相信任

translation.en: And second, though this is subjective,
translation.zh: 其次 虽然我这话有点主观

translation.en: when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.zh: 如果我情况正常洛杉矶没有比我更好的刑事辩护律师

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
translation.zh: 而杰瑞凭借自己的经验也能了解这一点

translation.en: And you think you're right now?
translation.zh: 那你现在情况正常吗？

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 正常

translation.en: This is an order
translation.zh: 特此命令

translation.en: transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.zh: 文森特先生代理的案件移交给你

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.zh: 要撤销这个命令也能这么快

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: 哈勒先生 我会观察你的表现

translation.en: I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.zh: 我要求你下周开始时提交最新案件清单

translation.en: After that, a bi-weekly status update
translation.zh: 之后每两周更新一次

translation.en: of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.zh: 你最终接手的每一个案件

translation.en: -Am I clear? -I won't let you down, Your Honor.
translation.zh: -我说清楚了吗？-法官大人 我不会辜负您

translation.en: Don't let your clients down.
translation.zh: 不要辜负你的委托人

translation.en: I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.zh: 我建议你立刻去文森特先生的办公室

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
translation.zh: 在我们进行这场谈话时

translation.en: and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.zh: 警察肯定正在搜查很有可能正在刺探委托人的隐私

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢您 法官大人

translation.en: Good luck, Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: 祝你好运 哈勒先生

translation.en: Well, did you get a case?
translation.zh: 接了一个案子吗？

translation.en: I just got a lot of them.
translation.zh: 刚接了一大堆

translation.en: Including Trevor Elliott.
translation.zh: 特雷弗埃利奥特的案子归我了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I need to meet the clients,
translation.zh: 我得见委托人

translation.en: get their sign-offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.zh: 拿到他们的签字授权但是我也许能卷土重来了 劳娜

translation.en: I might actually be back.
translation.zh: 我可能真的会东山再起

translation.en: What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.zh: 我不是跟你说过积极的想象吗？

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client.
translation.zh: 你起床时一个案子都没有

translation.en: Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.zh: 现在 你就代理上了特雷弗埃利奥特这种人的谋杀案

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
translation.zh: 还得他同意让我接手

translation.en: [Lorna] Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
translation.zh: 积极思维 米奇

translation.en: -Floor is closed, folks. -We have business on this floor.
translation.zh: -你们两个 这层楼不开-我们来有公事

translation.en: -Not today, you don't. -Talk to the judge.
translation.zh: -今天不行-那得法官同意才行

translation.en: Need to see some ID.
translation.zh: 我得查一下证件

translation.en: You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky-do's.
translation.zh: 招人烦对自己没好处

translation.en: Just saying.
translation.zh: 我就随便说说

translation.en: -Can I help you? -Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
translation.zh: -有何贵干？-我叫米奇哈勒 是个律师

translation.en: I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
translation.zh: 文森特先生代理的案件已经移交给我了

translation.en: You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.zh: 你明天再来吧这里是犯罪现场 闲人免进

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.zh: 犯罪现场在停车场 不在这办公室里

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.zh: 这里有委托人的文件需要我接手 显然还需要妥善保护

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
translation.zh: 你刚才说你是？

translation.en: Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.zh: 米奇哈勒这位是劳娜克雷恩 她是我同事

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
translation.zh: 米奇哈勒和劳娜克雷恩

translation.en: I need you to both leave. Now.
translation.zh: 我要求你们两个立刻离开

translation.en: -Dicky-do's, I'm telling you. -What was that?
translation.zh: -招人烦 我就跟你说吧-你说什么？

translation.en: That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.zh: 我没说你 但是既然你听到了就算了

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.zh: 你们正在破坏犯罪现场不能留在这里

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
translation.zh: 这份命令可以确认

translation.en: by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.zh: 我已经被高等法院审判长指派为

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
translation.zh: 接手杰瑞文森特委托人的替代律师

translation.en: That means his cases are now my cases,
translation.zh: 就是说他的案件现在已经是我的案件

translation.en: and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
translation.zh: 而你们无权在这里查阅文件

translation.en: That's attorney-client privilege.
translation.zh: 这是律师与委托人的保密特权

translation.en: Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.zh: 文森特先生是谋杀案受害者作案动机可能就在这些文件里

translation.en: -Even if that were the case-- -Counselor--
translation.zh: -即使那样…-律师…

translation.en: Just read the order, Detective.
translation.zh: 来读一下这份命令 探员

translation.en: Your crime scene is out in the garage
translation.zh: 您所说的犯罪现场在停车场

translation.en: and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.zh: 而且洛杉矶没有法官会同意犯罪现场包括这个办公室和文件

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.zh: 您说这个命令授权您接管文森特先生的全部案件？

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: -Then that puts you on our list. -Come again.
translation.zh: -那您就上了我们的名单了-什么意思？

translation.en: Our suspect list.
translation.zh: 我们的嫌疑人名单

translation.en: He's dead and you get the whole business?
translation.zh: 他死后您接手了全部生意？

translation.en: That's motive, ask me.
translation.zh: 要我说 这就是动机

translation.en: Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.zh: 您介意告诉我们您昨晚8点到午夜在什么地方吗？

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
translation.zh: 你逮住我了 探员

translation.en: I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.zh: 是我杀了杰瑞 大家听好 案子破了

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
translation.zh: 这么老的套路

translation.en: Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.zh: 你们是现在就走人还是我必须给法官打个电话？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Guys. -Nice to meet you, too.
translation.zh: -弟兄们-认识你我也很开心啊

translation.en: -Bye. -[detective] Let's go.
translation.zh: -再见啦-走

translation.en: Leave everything.
translation.zh: 什么都不要带走

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 干吗？

translation.en: All right. Come on.
translation.zh: 好了 来吧

translation.en: [Lorna] Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.zh: 有时候我觉得他们惹人生气

translation.en: how to piss people off.
translation.zh: 都是警察学校里教的

translation.en: When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.zh: 一想到公众和警方之前的各种过节

translation.en: you'd think "how not to piss people off" would be in the curriculum.
translation.zh: 你会觉得“如何不让人生气”应该作为课程内容的一部分

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
translation.zh: 你看我请西斯科入伙怎么样？

translation.en: Mickey.
translation.zh: 米奇

translation.en: He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.zh: 他是个不错的调查员属于我共事过的最棒的几个人之一

translation.en: Working with your ex-wife is one thing,
translation.zh: 你跟前妻共事已经是新鲜事了

translation.en: hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.zh: 还要招她男朋友入伙就太过火了

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
translation.zh: 如果特雷弗埃利奥特决定保留我

translation.en: I'm gonna need to move fast
translation.zh: 我得找个信得过的调查员

translation.en: with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
translation.zh: 快速行动 而且西斯科…

translation.en: Yeah, Mickey Haller.
translation.zh: 对 我是米奇哈勒

translation.en: Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.zh: 好的 先生 下午2点你是说今天下午2点？

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 先生 我会过去 谢谢

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.zh: 是谁？

translation.en: [sighs] It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.zh: 是坎特尔法官的助手杰瑞今天似乎有个庭审

translation.en: -What? -Yep.
translation.zh: -什么？-是啊

translation.en: -Are you gonna eat your sandwich? -No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.zh: -你三明治还吃吗？-不了 劳娜 归你了

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 快走吧

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. -Oh, I heard.
translation.zh: -我接替杰瑞文森特-我听说了

translation.en: Sorry. What's the name?
translation.zh: 抱歉 您贵姓？

translation.en: Haller. Mickey Haller.
translation.zh: 哈勒 米奇哈勒

translation.en: And your client's name?
translation.zh: 您代理人的名字？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
translation.zh: 是…莱茨 名字是伊基

translation.en: I think it's a theft.
translation.zh: 我记得是盗窃指控

translation.en: That would be Marc Daniels,
translation.zh: 那个是马克丹尼尔斯的

translation.en: who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.zh: 我在暂时顶着 所以其实是我的

translation.en: -Grand theft, by the by. -Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
translation.zh: -顺便说一句 是严重窃盗罪-很显然我需要延期

translation.en: Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
translation.zh: 很显然我不会让你延期

translation.en: -What? -I got out-of-town witnesses.
translation.zh: -什么？-我有外地来的证人

translation.en: I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.zh: 我宁可是法官或者你出面让他们白跑一趟 而不是我

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
translation.zh: 特别是我还想让他们再次出庭的话

translation.en: [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.zh: LA-292587加州人民诉伊基莱茨案

translation.en: And we're on.
translation.zh: 我们这就开始了

translation.en: Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.zh: 法官大人 本人莎拉谢泼德代表加利福尼亚人民参加庭审

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 法官大人 本人米奇哈勒代表被告方

translation.en: I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
translation.zh: 我马上过来我可以上前直接跟您说话吗？

translation.en: Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.zh: 法官大人 文森特先生昨晚意外去世

translation.en: I'm filing in.
translation.zh: 我刚接手

translation.en: My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
translation.zh: 我致以诚挚哀悼你什么时候可以准备好？

translation.en: -Well… -[Wallace] Don't be greedy.
translation.zh: -嗯…-别太贪心

translation.en: It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
translation.zh: 本案是法官审判 有两位证人

translation.en: [Sarah] Out-of-town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.zh: 而且来自外地 如果延期 我会有失去证人的风险

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天可以吗？

translation.en: Tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天？

translation.en: Look at the file.
translation.zh: 看看文件

translation.en: If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
translation.zh: 如果你觉得到没准备好就告诉我

translation.en: Step back.
translation.zh: 退下

translation.en: This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 本案推迟至明天上午十时审理

translation.en: -Wait, what? -Sir?
translation.zh: -等等 什么？-这位先生？

translation.en: Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
translation.zh: 法官大人 我们从旧金山飞到这里

translation.en: -This is not fair. -I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.zh: -这不公平-我恐怕得告诉您 事出紧急

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.zh: 受害人怎么办？我们经历过了紧急时刻

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
translation.zh: 天啊 我太太遭到攻击

translation.en: She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.zh: 她的项链被粗暴地从她身上抢走

translation.en: [Wallace] And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.zh: 本庭对此表示同情但这是不可避免的

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 本案推迟至明天上午十时审理

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
translation.zh: 这种程序下受害人没有权利可言

translation.en: -Yeah. Excuse me. -That's what she stole?
translation.zh: -不好意思-这是她偷的？

translation.en: At least your client has taste.
translation.zh: 至少你的委托人品味不错

translation.en: -Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. -Where's Jerry?
translation.zh: -我是米奇哈勒 你的律师-杰瑞呢？

translation.en: Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
translation.zh: 我们找个地方谈谈吧

translation.en: [Izzy] He was such a nice man.
translation.zh: 他是个好人

translation.en: He wasn't even charging me.
translation.zh: 他甚至没要我付钱

translation.en: At least, not yet.
translation.zh: 至少目前还没有

translation.en: Why would somebody kill him?
translation.zh: 怎么会有人想杀他？

translation.en: I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.zh: 我不知道 警察还在收集证据

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么样的社会啊？

translation.en: I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我得在明天之前准备好你的案子

translation.en: -So anything-- -I did not attack her.
translation.zh: -所以任何…-我没攻击她

translation.en: I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.zh: 我扯下项链就跑了 没打她

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.zh: 好 杰瑞没有尝试按这个认罪有什么原因吗？

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.zh: 因为他们建议的刑期是两年但是杰瑞说太重了

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.zh: 他觉得如果上庭的话我至少可以用情有可原的状况

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
translation.zh: 打动法官

translation.en: Which are?
translation.zh: 什么情况？

translation.en: I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.zh: 我是个好人 曾经有过毒瘾

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
translation.zh: 偷那条项链的人不是我

translation.en: so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.zh: 而是我自己都不认识的那个人

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
translation.zh: 那个人已经不存在了

translation.en: I went through rehab.
translation.zh: 我完成了戒毒治疗

translation.en: I'm in recovery.
translation.zh: 正在恢复

translation.en: I believe you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.zh: 但是我不知道那个人是不是真的不存在了

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
translation.zh: 我曾经对奥施康定上瘾

translation.en: You?
translation.zh: 你呢？

translation.en: Same, basically.
translation.zh: 差不多一样的东西

translation.en: Heroin.
translation.zh: 海洛因

translation.en: Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.zh: 我买不起奥施康定之后换的

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
translation.zh: 所以杰瑞的计划是安排你出庭？

translation.en: And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.zh: 还有把我良好的人格状态加入证据

translation.en: [Lorna] The trial is tomorrow, you say?
translation.zh: 你说明天开庭？

translation.en: Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.zh: 法官审判 有两个证人我觉得能搞定

translation.en: Mickey.
translation.zh: 米奇

translation.en: Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
translation.zh: 给马尔文比德尔曼打个电话告诉他我需要他帮个忙

translation.en: He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.zh: 他快80了你可能得提醒他欠我的人情

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
translation.zh: 特雷弗埃利奥特那边有消息吗？

translation.en: Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.zh: 杰瑞收了六十二万五千美元的定金已经扣得没剩多少了

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non-refundable.
translation.zh: 出庭费四十五万 不可退的

translation.en: -Wow. -I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.zh: 我知道 这些钱够打一年酒驾毒驾的

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
translation.zh: 大生意

translation.en: -Who's the judge? -James P. Stanton.
translation.zh: -法官是谁？-詹姆斯P斯丹顿

translation.en: He's an ex-defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.zh: 他以前是辩护律师 是件好事你快到了吗？

translation.en: -Your appointment's at 3:00. -I'm pulling up.
translation.zh: -约的时间是3点-我在加油赶

translation.en: Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.zh: 我们到底能不能确定埃利奥特还没雇别的律师？

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.zh: 别担心别的律师了 全力投入吧

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Your name?
translation.zh: 贵姓？

translation.en: Haller. Mickey Haller.
translation.zh: 米奇哈勒

translation.en: Nice car, man.
translation.zh: 车不错 老兄

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -[valet] I got it.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-交给我吧

translation.en: Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: 哈勒先生

translation.en: Go right up. He's waiting for you.
translation.zh: 上楼吧 他在等您了

translation.en: Sure you don't need anything? Water…
translation.zh: （夜曲传说） 您真的不喝点什么吗？水…

translation.en: I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Mr. Elliott's in his office?
translation.zh: 埃利奥特先生在办公室？

translation.en: His office? [chuckles] No.
translation.zh: 他的办公室？不是

translation.en: [Mickey] Mr. Elliott.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特先生

translation.en: Mickey Haller. How you doing?
translation.zh: 我是米奇哈勒 您好

translation.en: Mr. Elliott?
translation.zh: 埃利奥特先生？

translation.en: [Trevor] I stand trial for murder next week.
translation.zh: 我因谋杀罪名下周就要出庭受审了

translation.en: My attorney's just been shot dead.
translation.zh: 可我的律师刚被人枪杀了

translation.en: You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
translation.zh: 你可以想象一下我感觉多好

translation.en: Do they know anything? Any suspects?
translation.zh: 他们发现什么了吗？有嫌疑人了吗？

translation.en: Not to my knowledge, no.
translation.zh: 据我所知还没有

translation.en: I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
translation.zh: 警方告诉我他们想询问他所有的客户

translation.en: Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
translation.zh: 我当然希望 其他事情解决之前

translation.en: while this other matter is pending.
translation.zh: 您什么都别跟他们说

translation.en: What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.zh: 怎么？他们还要把我当成杀了杰瑞的人起诉？

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
translation.zh: 为什么不呢？什么狗屁事情都有可能

translation.en: So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.zh: 你又是谁？我怎么从没听说过你？

translation.en: You've never heard of me
translation.zh: 您没听说过我

translation.en: because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
translation.zh: 是因为我选择不为人知

translation.en: Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.zh: 明星律师们会让他们的客户过分曝光

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
translation.zh: 那不是我的风格

translation.en: Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.zh: 就像我的案件主理解释过的杰瑞的案子移交给我了

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
translation.zh: 如果您看一下跟他签订的委托协议

translation.en: you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.zh: 您会发现杰瑞可以跟我讨论您的案子

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
translation.zh: 他谈过吗？跟你？

translation.en: No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.zh: 没有 我要说明的是杰瑞信任我

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
translation.zh: 不等于我信任你

translation.en: No, it does not.
translation.zh: 是 不等于

translation.en: -It's Mickey, is it? -That's right.
translation.zh: -你叫米奇对吗？-对

translation.en: You play any basketball, Mickey?
translation.zh: 米奇 你打篮球吗？

translation.en: -A little bit. -[Trevor] I don't.
translation.zh: -偶尔打-我不打

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 不怎么打

translation.en: I love to watch though.
translation.zh: 但是我喜欢看

translation.en: But it always drove me crazy
translation.zh: 但是顶尖球员

translation.en: seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.zh: 罚球不进 总会让我发狂

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.zh: 这是你能控制的一件事每一次罚球都一样

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 站在线上

translation.en: And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
translation.zh: 但是谋事在人成事在天

translation.en: I don't mean to be an asshole.
translation.zh: 我不想跟个混蛋一样

translation.en: Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.zh: 或者我其实就是我们本来下周要开庭的

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
translation.zh: 为了恢复我的名声我已经等了五个月

translation.en: -I understand. -Do you?
translation.zh: -我能理解-真的？

translation.en: You understand what it's like for an innocent man
translation.zh: 你想想 一个无辜的人

translation.en: to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.zh: 数着日子等待出庭的那一天是什么心情？

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.zh: 还有媒体上长篇累牍的谎言和废话

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.zh: 还得每时每刻都他妈带着脚环

translation.en: -You understand all of that? -I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
translation.zh: -这些你都理解？-我代理过遭受不实指控的客户

translation.en: Do not handle me.
translation.zh: 用不着博我的好感

translation.en: Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.zh: 好吧 那我有话就直说了

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
translation.zh: 杰瑞文森特是个出色的律师

translation.en: -I'm better. -So you say.
translation.zh: -我比他还出色-你自己说的吧

translation.en: -So would say Jerry. -Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.zh: -换了杰瑞也会这么说-也许吧 死无对证

translation.en: -I get your frustration. -I asked you not to handle me.
translation.zh: -我理解你的困惑-我跟你说了不要刻意讨好我

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.zh: 在我考虑雇你之前得知道你为下周准备好没有

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
translation.zh: 因为我不会同意延期

translation.en: Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.zh: 一周都不行 一天都他妈的不行

translation.en: -I could be ready. -You're up to speed on the case?
translation.zh: -我可以准备好-这案子你都了解了？

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
translation.zh: 我会的 如果没准备好我会告诉你的

translation.en: But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.zh: 但是我有信心带你到时候出庭

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.zh: 你得告诉我有信心才能接到这个案子

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说吧

translation.en: I need to think about this.
translation.zh: 我得考虑一下

translation.en: That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
translation.zh: 好主意 了解一下我

translation.en: Take your time. Not too much.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 但是别花太多时间

translation.en: The longer you wait,
translation.zh: 你拖得时间越长

translation.en: the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.zh: 法官推迟开庭的可能性就越大

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.zh: 如果我接了你的案子可以确保不会推迟

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.zh: 我承认你的销售技巧很高超

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特先生 我是个做刑事辩护的

translation.en: I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.zh: 业绩还不错 你有我的电话号码

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
translation.zh: 米奇 你明白吗？我失去了一切

translation.en: My life, my reputation…
translation.zh: 我的生活 我的名声…

translation.en: worst of all, my wife.
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 我的太太

translation.en: Who I very much did love.
translation.zh: 我很爱她

translation.en: I get it.
translation.zh: 我理解

translation.en: You get nothing. Not yet.
translation.zh: 你不理解 还没有理解

translation.en: You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.zh: 你就是觉得自己中了彩票但是我跟你说…你还没有

translation.en: [Lorna over phone] Next week? That is impossible.
translation.zh: 下周？米奇 这不可能

translation.en: [Mickey] It was a deal-breaker.
translation.zh: 我敢肯定这是成败关键

translation.en: First, let's land him,
translation.zh: 首先 我们得搞定他

translation.en: then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
translation.zh: 然后我劝他接受延期

translation.en: That has to go.
translation.zh: 必须得扔出去

translation.en: -What? -Nothing.
translation.zh: （当初我嘴巴严一点就不会在这里了） -什么？-没事

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
translation.zh: 我需要一个司机

translation.en: I need this time to be going over files.
translation.zh: 好有时间看完文件

translation.en: I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
translation.zh: 我考虑也许昆特罗可以 他有空吗？

translation.en: Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
translation.zh: 我听说他还在科克兰蹲着呢

translation.en: Well, what about Stevie?
translation.zh: 斯蒂维怎么样？

translation.en: Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.zh: 斯蒂维车开得烂极了没人愿意坐他的车

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
translation.zh: 好吧 你帮我到处问问好吗？

translation.en: I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
translation.zh: 我这就停车了 一会儿见

translation.en: Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.zh: 天啊 西斯科 你差点把我吓死了

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
translation.zh: 老兄 你有什么大事儿来这里？

translation.en: Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
translation.zh: 劳娜说你想雇我

translation.en: Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.zh: 不是这个案子 西斯科我找你是因为特雷弗埃利奥特的案子

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
translation.zh: 警方会负责杰瑞文森特的命案

translation.en: You're giving me a heart attack, man.
translation.zh: 老兄 你弄得我心脏病都快犯了

translation.en: You could have given me one.
translation.zh: 你也差点弄得我心脏病发作

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
translation.zh: 特雷弗埃利奥特 一条大鱼

translation.en: Yeah, if I get him.
translation.zh: 对啊 我能搞定他的话

translation.en: I haven't nailed down the gig.
translation.zh: 还没完全搞定

translation.en: I need to be able to tell him something good.
translation.zh: 我得想办法找理由打动他

translation.en: Something to make him wanna hire me.
translation.zh: 这样他好下决心雇我

translation.en: Have you seen the file?
translation.zh: 你看过文件了吗？

translation.en: Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.zh: 一部分 两条人命他在现场 不是件容易的案子

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer "stellar" somehow.
translation.zh: 是啊 我得想办法让这案子“容易”一点儿

translation.en: Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.zh: 也许玛姬可以给我们点技术上的细节

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
translation.zh: 见鬼 玛姬

translation.en: [Maggie] Damn it.
translation.zh: 完蛋了

translation.en: You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你可以走了他来之前我应该没什么问题

translation.en: I'm not going.
translation.zh: 我不走

translation.en: Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half-hour.
translation.zh: 我自己待半个小时天不会塌

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
translation.zh: 世界还没变得那么危险

translation.en: -Not happening. -I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.zh: -我不会走的-我盼着今晚能好好过

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.zh: 如果爸爸情绪不错的话会更有可能

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
translation.zh: 而爸爸的情绪完全在于

translation.en: if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.zh: 你会不会因为他迟到15分钟而大发雷霆

translation.en: There he is.
translation.zh: 他来了

translation.en: -[Mickey] I'm sorry. -[Maggie] Really?
translation.zh: -对不起-真的吗？

translation.en: Hi, Dad.
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Sorry, Mags.
translation.zh: 对不起 玛姬

translation.en: -You look good. Sorry. -You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.zh: -你看起棒极了 对不起-你答应了6点过来的

translation.en: [Mickey] I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
translation.zh: 你真的想恢复共同抚养权？首先…

translation.en: Maggie, I'm here now.
translation.zh: 玛姬 你看既然我来了

translation.en: How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
translation.zh: 咱俩之间的事情以后再说好吗？

translation.en: -[Maggie] I'll pick you up in the morning. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我早上去接你-好

translation.en: -I love you. -Love you, too.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: If you're gonna treat me like shit,
translation.zh: 你真要把我当狗屎一样对待

translation.en: have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
translation.zh: 至少行行好 不要打扮得这么漂亮

translation.en: [Hayley] Hello.
translation.zh: 你好啊

translation.en: -How are you, baby? You good? -I'm good.
translation.zh: -宝贝儿 你好吗？-好啊

translation.en: -Ready? Have your bag? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的？东西拿好了？-好了

translation.en: [Cisco] He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
translation.zh: 杰瑞自己有预感呢

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
translation.zh: 十天前他提交了一份动议

translation.en: Transfer his practice in case of his death.
translation.zh: 在他死后移交案件

translation.en: Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
translation.zh: 现在咱们专注在埃利奥特身上好吗？

translation.en: Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.zh: 下周开庭这事儿米奇没那么认真 对吧？

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.zh: 严格地说 还有九天好吧 这话我以前说过

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
translation.zh: 但是这种案子可不常有

translation.en: And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
translation.zh: 而且米奇需要这案子他得有点事情做

translation.en: He's okay with… You know?
translation.zh: 你知不知道他对我们…？

translation.en: -I take it you haven't told him. -I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.zh: -我觉得你还没跟他说-我只是还没找到合适的机会

translation.en: [Hayley] So, you didn't actually go in the water?
translation.zh: 那么你其实没有下水？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: You know that nightmare I have?
translation.zh: 你知道我的噩梦吗？

translation.en: It's not so much of me almost drowning,
translation.zh: 并不是我淹死

translation.en: it's of you.
translation.zh: 而是你

translation.en: Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.zh: 留下你撒手而去才让我痛苦

translation.en: -Dad… -What?
translation.zh: -爸…-什么？

translation.en: You had an accident.
translation.zh: 你不过是发生了事故

translation.en: You're not the first surfer it's happened to
translation.zh: 你不是第一个冲浪出事儿的人

translation.en: and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.zh: 我也不是第一个父母遭遇不幸的孩子

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
translation.zh: 你真坚强

translation.en: [in English] Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.zh: 但别变得像你妈妈那么坚强 好吗？

translation.en: -[chuckles] I'll try not to. -Well, good.
translation.zh: -我尽力吧-好

translation.en: She's worried about you.
translation.zh: 她很担心你

translation.en: She said that?
translation.zh: 她自己说的？

translation.en: She thinks it might be some mid-life thing on top of the pills.
translation.zh: 她觉得不光是药物还有人到中年的问题

translation.en: Is it?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Well, maybe a little.
translation.zh: 也许有点吧

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.zh: 闺女 两段失败的婚姻中断了的法律生涯

translation.en: six months in rehab…
translation.zh: 戒毒六个月…

translation.en: You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
translation.zh: 你女儿呢 就是彩票头奖 拜托…

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.zh: 我回首过去时从我还是个孩子 看着我爸爸工作时

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.zh: 自己就一直想做个辩护律师

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.zh: 法学院里教的是司法系统如何运转

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
translation.zh: 你入行才会发现一切都是模糊的

translation.en: Everybody's working an angle.
translation.zh: 人人都追逐自己的利益

translation.en: Everybody lies.
translation.zh: 人人都说谎

translation.en: After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.zh: 过不了多久 你就会开始怀疑自己从事的是不是正当的事业

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.zh: 你知道妈妈从来不会那么想 对吗？她不接坏人的案子

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
translation.zh: 你妈是个真正有信仰的人

translation.en: That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.zh: 那正是她事业成功的原因

translation.en: But you're not?
translation.zh: 可你不是吗？

translation.en: I was. I think I still am.
translation.zh: 过去是 我想现在也是吧

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.zh: 我相信 在我们的系统里被证明有罪之前 每个人都是无辜的

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
translation.zh: 一旦州政府指控你

translation.en: well, I'm all you got.
translation.zh: 我就是你唯一的救星

translation.en: Now what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: Sorry to intrude.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰你了

translation.en: This better be good, Detective.
translation.zh: 探员 最好是好消息

translation.en: It's important.
translation.zh: 很重要

translation.en: We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.zh: 我们真的得看看杰瑞文森特的文件

translation.en: I realize you have attorney-client privilege.
translation.zh: 我明白你受律师代理人特权保护

translation.en: DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
translation.zh: 地区检察官说你很有可能给我们吃闭门羹

translation.en: Seriously? I knew this guy.
translation.zh: 真的？我认识这个人

translation.en: I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.zh: 我真的需要你帮忙好清楚我们要对付的是什么人

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.zh: 爆头致命 干净利落

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.zh: 杀手还捡走了弹壳

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
translation.zh: 是有人想干掉杰瑞文森特

translation.en: and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.zh: 他们没动他的钱包和现金

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.zh: 但是拿走了包和笔记本电脑

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.zh: 现在的问题是 里面到底有什么？他究竟知道了什么才引来杀身之祸？

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.zh: 如果有答案那很有可能在他的文件里

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
translation.zh: 我是真的希望可以帮你 探员

translation.en: I'm asking you to help yourself.
translation.zh: 我是请你帮你自己

translation.en: You're at risk, Counselor.
translation.zh: 你有危险 律师

translation.en: You could be next.
translation.zh: 你可能就是下一个

translation.en: [Cisco] Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.zh: 杰瑞跟黑帮或者毒枭有联系吗？

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
translation.zh: 我觉得没有 他是个直脾气

translation.en: -Ex-prosecutor. -Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
translation.zh: -前检察官-也许是他以前送进监狱的人

translation.en: One second.
translation.zh: 稍等

translation.en: Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.zh: 对 我想过这种可能仔细查看一下文件

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex-clients, everybody, all right?
translation.zh: 看看有没有任何威胁的痕迹 委托人以前的委托人、任何人 明白吗？

translation.en: I'm on it.
translation.zh: 交给我

translation.en: In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
translation.zh: 还有 埃利奥特允许我们

translation.en: to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.zh: 勘测他在马里布的房子命案是在那里发生的

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
translation.zh: 我们了解真相很重要

translation.en: I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.zh: 我会把地址发给你 中午在那里碰面

translation.en: This means we have the case?
translation.zh: 这就是说我们拿到案子了？

translation.en: Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.zh: 还没有我们了解的越多 胜算就越大

translation.en: -Where are you right now? -Heading into trial.
translation.zh: -你现在在哪儿？-准备开庭

translation.en: Marvin.
translation.zh: 马尔文

translation.en: -Oh! Mickey! -Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
translation.zh: -米奇！-谢谢你过来 我很感激

translation.en: Why wouldn't I?
translation.zh: 怎么能不来呢？

translation.en: When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.zh: 我认识的最伟大的人要我帮忙

translation.en: I give my help.
translation.zh: 我当然乐于效劳

translation.en: How's Eleanor?
translation.zh: 埃莉诺怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
translation.zh: 她好得不得了 还有她要我向你致敬

translation.en: Send my love to her. Thank you. [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.zh: -请向她转达我的敬意 谢谢你-LA-292587诉伊基莱茨案

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
translation.zh: 马上过来

translation.en: Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
translation.zh: 法官大人 我是米奇哈勒可否上前与您讨论？

translation.en: Please tell me you're ready.
translation.zh: 希望你准备好了

translation.en: -Almost, Judge. -[Wallace] Mr. Haller.
translation.zh: -差不多了 法官大人-哈勒先生

translation.en: Actually, Judge.
translation.zh: 实际上 法官大人

translation.en: At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.zh: 尽管有进一步激怒霍尔特先生的风险

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
translation.zh: 我们能否传唤他私下谈谈？

translation.en: -Excuse me? -What's going on?
translation.zh: -什么？-耍什么花样？

translation.en: A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
translation.zh: 虽然有点非正统

translation.en: of judicial economy and justice.
translation.zh: 却符合司法成本和正义的最佳利益

translation.en: Take 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 只要30秒

translation.en: Mr. Holt.
translation.zh: 霍尔特先生

translation.en: Could you approach the bench?
translation.zh: 能否请您过来讨论一下？

translation.en: How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
translation.zh: 您好 我会非常快

translation.en: My client is charged with grand theft.
translation.zh: 我的委托人被诉严重窃盗罪

translation.en: Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
translation.zh: 根据《刑法典》第487节

translation.en: means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.zh: 被盗物品价值应该超过950美元

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.zh: 法官大人那条项链最多也就值400美元吧？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.zh: 我有几次的代理费是用钻石和黄金支付的

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
translation.zh: 所以对估值略知一二

translation.en: But to be sure, Judge,
translation.zh: 但是出于稳妥 法官大人

translation.en: I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
translation.zh: 我还请来了一位这方面的专家

translation.en: That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
translation.zh: 那位先生名叫马尔文比德尔曼是位珠宝商

translation.en: He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
translation.zh: 他可以为我们做个快速估价

translation.en: The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.zh: 地区检察官也可以另请高明

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock-off?
translation.zh: 我猜你太太不知道这件是假货？

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
translation.zh: 我当然不想让她失望

translation.en: Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 你是在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: I am not. I am not.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: Even if it is a knock-off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.zh: 即使这是件假货被告在作案时以为这是真货

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
translation.zh: 你有证人能证明她当时的精神状况吗？

translation.en: Did you not have the necklace appraised?
translation.zh: 你没有对项链进行估值？

translation.en: We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
translation.zh: 我们有他保险公司的估值

translation.en: Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
translation.zh: 也许要查查有没有欺诈行为了

translation.en: I could be wrong, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 我可能是错的

translation.en: Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.zh: 谢泼德小姐你对诉讼如何进行有何见解？

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
translation.zh: 全案驳回？我可以走了？

translation.en: Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.zh: 除非地区检察官决定起诉霍尔特夫妇

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
translation.zh: 而你被请来做控方证人

translation.en: but I don't think that'll happen.
translation.zh: 但是我觉得那不会发生

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Didn't even have to get up there
translation.zh: 你都不用站在那里

translation.en: and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.zh: 证明自己是个多好的人

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么感谢你我答应你总有一天我会付钱给你

translation.en: You pay me now.
translation.zh: 你现在就付钱给我

translation.en: I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.zh: 我破产了 名下一分钱都没有

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
translation.zh: 你有驾照吗？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Lorna] What do you mean you hired her?
translation.zh: 你说雇了她是什么意思？

translation.en: I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.zh: 我跟你说我需要一位司机正好她会开车

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
translation.zh: 其实我车开得很好

translation.en: She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
translation.zh: 劳娜 其实她车开得很好

translation.en: [Lorna] It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.zh: 你在办公室工作死不了人 太多条条框框

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.zh: 太多条条框框 我必须得一边跑路一边工作

translation.en: -Didn't you say she's an addict? -Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.zh: -你不是说过她有毒瘾吗？-以前有 我没资格评判别人 右转

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
translation.zh: 我快到了 一会儿打给你

translation.en: Mickey, no-- [groans]
translation.zh: 米奇 不要…

translation.en: -Maggie. -Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
translation.zh: -玛姬-嗨 劳娜 见到你真高兴

translation.en: Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我也是 你这身真漂亮

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
translation.zh: 有什么要我帮忙的？

translation.en: We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.zh: 劳娜 我们两个都关心他

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy
translation.zh: 我很开心

translation.en: for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.zh: 米奇的事业有所起色…

translation.en: But?
translation.zh: 但是呢？

translation.en: But taking over a high-profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.zh: 但是从一个死于枪击的律师手上接这么一件高规格的谋杀案

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.zh: 而且律师的死因不明我们真的觉得这是个好主意？

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
translation.zh: 玛姬 我们面临着很多财务问题

translation.en: I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.zh: 我费尽全力才让他的业务磕磕绊绊往前走

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.zh: 他的命比他的律师职业重要

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.zh: 他需要先恢复好他女儿需要他恢复好

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.zh: 我明白 但这件案子会让他恢复元气

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.zh: 一年来这是他第一次像个活人

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
translation.zh: 而且你了解米奇

translation.en: The only thing he likes more than a fight
translation.zh: 他是争强好胜

translation.en: is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
translation.zh: 但更喜欢的是逆风翻盘

translation.en: [Mickey] I'll be about 15 minutes.
translation.zh: 我大概需要15分钟

translation.en: [Izzy] Sounds good.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Welcome to the jungle.
translation.zh: 危险地带欢迎您

translation.en: Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
translation.zh: 记得提醒我我们绝不能让陪审团来这里

translation.en: They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.zh: 他们会痛恨这个人 我们就输定了

translation.en: [Cisco] Wife was there on the bed.
translation.zh: 他老婆死在床上

translation.en: Boyfriend there on the floor.
translation.zh: 情夫死在地上

translation.en: Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.zh: 警察认为埃利奥特站在门口也许看着他们操…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.zh: 通奸了好一阵子 然后才进来开的枪

translation.en: [Mickey] Murder weapon was never found.
translation.zh: 凶器一直没找到

translation.en: Probably out there in the ocean.
translation.zh: 也许已经在海里了

translation.en: I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.zh: 我说不准 米克你水平很高 但是这案子有胜算吗？

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
translation.zh: 如果他们能证明埃利奥特事发时在这里

translation.en: Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
translation.zh: 动机充分 枪击证据明显

translation.en: Has he given you his story?
translation.zh: 他跟你谈过这件事了吗？

translation.en: Hey, listen, there's something else.
translation.zh: 嘿 还有件事儿

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.zh: 我知道你不介意我跟劳娜约会

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
translation.zh: 至少你说过你不介意

translation.en: Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.zh: 劳娜一直说她要等到时机合适再跟你说

translation.en: but somehow,
translation.zh: 但是不知道为什么

translation.en: I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.zh: 我猜她觉得合适的时机永远不会到来

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
translation.zh: 所以我跟你说吧

translation.en: Me and Lorna,
translation.zh: 我和劳娜

translation.en: we're gonna get married.
translation.zh: 我们要结婚了

translation.en: Ah.
translation.zh: 啊

translation.en: What do you mean, "Ah"? What is "Ah"? Is it okay with you?
translation.zh: 你“啊”这一声是什么意思？你觉得这事儿可以吗？

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
translation.zh: 不关我的事儿啊 西斯科

translation.en: But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.zh: 但是我想知道 你觉得可以吗？

translation.en: Do you love her?
translation.zh: 你爱她吗？

translation.en: With all my heart.
translation.zh: 全心全意

translation.en: Then it's all right with me.
translation.zh: 那我没问题

translation.en: But I'll tell you, Cisco.
translation.zh: 但是我得告诉你 西斯科

translation.en: She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.zh: 她是我这辈子最重要的四个人之一

translation.en: -Should you ever hurt her-- -Of course I would never.
translation.zh: -要是你有一天伤害了她…-我绝对永远都不会

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
translation.zh: 她是最棒的

translation.en: Who's the fourth?
translation.zh: 谁是第四个？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You said four people.
translation.zh: 你说有四个人

translation.en: Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
translation.zh: 海莉、玛姬、劳娜和…

translation.en: Who's the fourth?
translation.zh: 谁是第四个？

translation.en: Mickey Haller.
translation.zh: 我是米奇哈勒

translation.en: Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
translation.zh: 好 我会赶过去

translation.en: Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
translation.zh: 特雷弗埃利奥特找我

translation.en: [Trevor] You checked out well.
translation.zh: 你名声不错

translation.en: High-performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.zh: 上庭记录出色大多数人都说你比杰瑞还出色

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.zh: 直到你行为怪异 还染上了毒瘾

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
translation.zh: 都是过去的事了

translation.en: Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
translation.zh: 米奇 这件案子的关键在于

translation.en: I need to win it in court
translation.zh: 我必须在法庭审理上赢这场官司

translation.en: and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.zh: 而且我需要在公众舆论方面也赢

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days.
translation.zh: 这年头 世上的人说指控谁就指控谁

translation.en: Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
translation.zh: 看看我的推特推送

translation.en: I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
translation.zh: 我需要的律师要能赢回我的自由

translation.en: and my name back.
translation.zh: 还要赢回我的名声

translation.en: Are you that lawyer?
translation.zh: 你是那个律师吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: No, all I can do is get you a "Not guilty."
translation.zh: 我所能做的只是给你赢得无罪判决

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
translation.zh: 我没法给你赢得无辜的结论

translation.en: The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.zh: 法庭有法庭的工作方式最好的结果只会是无罪

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
translation.zh: 这个你能做到吗？肯定吗？

translation.en: Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.zh: 取决于我拿什么进行辩论

translation.en: -I didn't kill them. -I didn't ask you.
translation.zh: -他们不是我杀的-我没问这个

translation.en: But I need you to know, I didn't.
translation.zh: 但是我需要你知道 我没杀人

translation.en: All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
translation.zh: 好吧 特雷弗 咱们这么说吧

translation.en: I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.zh: 只要我知道拿什么进行辩论几乎所有案件我都能赢下来

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
translation.zh: 但是现在我不知道

translation.en: So you lie to me,
translation.zh: 所以如果你骗我

translation.en: I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.zh: 不管我多需要 我都不接你的案子

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.zh: 我在高中时一点都不招人喜欢

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.zh: 女生们不理我好在我一直都可以跟塞尔达聊天

translation.en: Real life sucked.
translation.zh: 真实世界糟糕透了

translation.en: But video games, they mattered.
translation.zh: 但是电子游戏太棒了

translation.en: Then I met Lara.
translation.zh: 后来我遇到了拉拉

translation.en: She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.zh: 她与众不同 既漂亮又聪明

translation.en: And she loved me.
translation.zh: 而且她爱我

translation.en: We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.zh: 我们研究生毕业时赶上游戏产业大爆发

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.zh: 但是没有人能解决恐怖谷这个问题

translation.en: Uncanny what?
translation.zh: 恐怖什么？

translation.en: If you're trying to make something humanlike,
translation.zh: 如果你把一件东西做得很像真人

translation.en: the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.zh: 除非几乎是近乎完美的模拟否则人类大脑会自发地抗拒它

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
translation.zh: 电子游戏的角色都很像真人

translation.en: but not close enough.
translation.zh: 但是不够像

translation.en: Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
translation.zh: 特别是眼睛 总是功亏一篑

translation.en: But the closer the characters resemble us,
translation.zh: 但是角色越像我们

translation.en: the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.zh: 我们觉得联系越紧密就会玩更长时间

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.zh: 这就是恐怖谷 而我成功地跨越了它

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
translation.zh: 我的工作是在我的车库里完成的

translation.en: One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.zh: 一个脚本 差不多一百行代码

translation.en: changed everything.
translation.zh: 改变了一切

translation.en: The girl in the game.
translation.zh: 游戏里的那个女孩子

translation.en: Nocturna.
translation.zh: 夜曲

translation.en: That was our first big hit.
translation.zh: 那是我们的第一款热卖作品

translation.en: It's what put us on the map.
translation.zh: 为我们打下了基础

translation.en: And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.zh: 当然 我这个角色是按照拉拉的样子建模的

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
translation.zh: 毫不夸张地说

translation.en: is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.zh: 这家公司所做的一切都暗藏了她的DNA

translation.en: We were a team.
translation.zh: 我们并肩合作

translation.en: I didn't know she was cheating on me.
translation.zh: 但是我那时不知道她背叛了我

translation.en: Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.zh: 现在回头看 我没日没夜地工作

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.zh: 一直在到处出差 所以她心生怨恨

translation.en: Angry.
translation.zh: 愤怒

translation.en: I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.zh: 那天我去那里是为了给她一个惊喜

translation.en: And instead…
translation.zh: 结果却是…

translation.en: I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.zh: 我永远都没法把那一幕从我脑海里抹去

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.zh: 我看见她死在那里我的妻子 最好的朋友

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
translation.zh: 还有那个该死的瑜伽教练

translation.en: And everyone thinks I killed her,
translation.zh: 而每个人都觉得是我杀了她

translation.en: but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.zh: 但真相是 即使我把她捉奸在床

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
translation.zh: 我都不会离开她

translation.en: I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.zh: 我会求她回到我身边 因为我需要她

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.zh: 人们说我是个天才说我写的代码有魔力

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.zh: 有魔力的那个人是拉拉是她激励了我

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.zh: 没有她 我应该现在都还在住车库里

translation.en: I never could have killed her
translation.zh: 我绝对不会杀她

translation.en: because without her…
translation.zh: 因为没有了她…

translation.en: I have no magic.
translation.zh: 我就没有了魔力

translation.en: That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.zh: 这就是你要处理的案子你能搞定吗？

translation.en: I can win with that.
translation.zh: 有这些我可以赢下来

translation.en: -You can win with that? -I can.
translation.zh: -有这些你就能赢下来？-可以

translation.en: -You can win with that next week? -I can.
translation.zh: -下周就能赢下来？-可以

translation.en: Then you're hired.
translation.zh: 那这案子归你了

translation.en: -[Lorna] Well? -We got it.
translation.zh: -怎么样？-是我们的了

translation.en: -We got the case? -Lots of work to do, Lorna.
translation.zh: -案子归我们了？-劳娜 要干的活儿很多

translation.en: -We need to keep our heads. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -我们得冷静-天啊

translation.en: Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.zh: 活儿很多 让西斯科来办公室见我

translation.en: Mickey…
translation.zh: 米奇…

translation.en: See you in a few.
translation.zh: 回头见

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
translation.zh: 眼泪在眼里打转

translation.en: Uh, just allergies.
translation.zh: 过敏而已

translation.en: Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
translation.zh: 还有 你最好盯着前面的路

translation.en: You really okay?
translation.zh: 说真的 你还好吗？

translation.en: Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
translation.zh: 好得不得了 前面转弯好吗？

translation.en: What? Is something wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？有什么不对劲吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we're being followed.
translation.zh: 对 有人在跟着我们
